title: Celebrity Chef Showdown 2019: Suzelle DIY designs 'Spanakopizza' for charity
text:

The annual Col'Cacchio Celebrity Chef Showdown is here! And the celebs chosen this year include Lorna Maseko, Kwesta and Suzelle DIY.

Make sure you support your celeb in their quest to achieve SA’s most loved pizza and give to the Red Cross Children's Hospital & Trust in the process.

Celebrities were asked to design their own pizzas. Lorna's pizza is a heart-healthy wonder, ideal for the lactose-intolerant or resistant, while Kwesta made a super meaty pizza. My personal favourite was Suzelle DIY's as it was Greek-inspired. She calls it the 'Spanakopizza', all the ingredients of a spanakopita, but on a pizza base. That is, cheese, spinach, spring onions and some phyllo pastry shards to finish. SO. YUMMY!

Order your favourite from 27 September to 30 November on Mr D or at any Col'Cacchio's restaurant as R5 of each celeb pizza ordered will be donated to the Red Cross Children's Hospital & Trust. PLUS stand a chance to WIN a 7 Night, 5 Star Luxury European River Cruise. You also stand a chance of winning one of our exclusive celeb-signed pizza boxes when ordering through Mr D!.
